verses.text: Mamin Jehová, a t'ayach tzin avaji ayic svalan in b'a. Svak' val vip in k'anan t'ayach to tz'ok' a k'ool t'ayin.
D'a ichanh swal in b'a, a val t'a ichanh swal vilk'olal.
Mamin Jehová, ayic manhxo animaoc vaj svab'i, ojtac val in b'e. Ha t'a jun b'e b'aj tzin b'ati, ata' ix yaq'uem yaal eb' ajk'ol t'ayin.
Tzin b'at q'uelan t'a in wach', malaj junok mach sjavi yic tz'och ved'oc. Malaj mach tzin colani. Malaj mach tz'och ilk'olal vuuj, wach'chom tzin chami.
Mamin, a val t'ayach swal in b'a, svalan icha tik: Ha t'ayach tzin col in b'a, a achnhej tzach in nib'ej t'a yichanh masanil tas t'a sat lu'um tik.
Cotanh q'uelan t'ayin tzin avaj t'ayach, yujto malaj vip. Colinel t'a eb' tzin pechan b'eyek'oc, yujto te ay yip eb' t'a vichanh.
Ik' in elta t'a skal in yaelal in k'ana', yic wach' ol val wach' lolonel t'ayach, haxo eb' anima wach' spensar ol och oyan eb' t'a in patic ayic ol ak'an a wach'k'olal t'ayin, xin chi.
